info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 10:30AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA... CATTARAUGUS...ALLEGANY...AND SOUTHERN ERIE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...Two bands of heavy lake effect snow that are reducing visibility to a quarter of a mile in some areas. These bands of heavy snow are producing heavy snow at the rate of 1 to 2 inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1029 AM EST, one band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Portland to near Little Valley. The second band of heavy snow was located along a line from near Silver Creek to near Houghton. Both bands of lake effect snow are slowly moving southeast. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Dunkirk, Fredonia, Salamanca, Wellsville, Springville, Alfred, Westfield, Gowanda, Silver Creek, Ashford, Franklinville, Mayville, Belfast, Cuba, Rushford, SUNY Fredonia, Ashford Hollow, Houghton, Lake Erie State Park and Evangola State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 60 and 58. Interstate 86 between exits 20 and 21, and between exits 27 and 32. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through one of these bands of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
